mapper.insert: INSERT INTO purchase_request(ma_pr, ngay_yeu_cau, sys_id_user) VALUES (#{maPR}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{nguoiYeuCau});
mapper.select: SELECT pr.sys_id_pr, pr.ma_pr, pr.ngay_yeu_cau, pr.trang_thai, pr.sys_id_user, u.full_name FROM purchase_request pr JOIN user u ON pr.sys_id_user = u.sys_id_user
